original_text: For the Lord your God dried up the Jordan before you until you had crossed over. The Lord your God did to the Jordan what he had done to the Red Sea when he dried it up before us until we had crossed over.
korean_text: 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 요단 물을 너희 앞에서 마르게 하사 너희를 건너게 하신 것이 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 우리 앞에 홍해를 말리시고 우리를 건너게 하심과 같았나니

sentences.original_text: For the Lord your God dried up the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주 너의 하나님이 요단을 말리셨음이라

sentences.original_text: before you until you had crossed over
The Lord your God did to the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님이 요단에게 행하신 것을

sentences.original_text: what he had done to the Red Sea
when he dried it up before us
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리 앞에서 그것을 말리셨을 때
